# kv4.3 and Pdgfrb in KEGG pathway  

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(igraph)
library(org.Mm.eg.db)
```


```{r}
kegg_pathways <- readRDS(file = "../../P2y12r-and-C1q/data/KEGG/KEGG_pathways_formatted.rds")
names_to_display <- readRDS(file = "../../P2y12r-and-C1q/data/KEGG/names_to_display.rds")
```


```{r}
genes_info <- select(x = org.Mm.eg.db, 
                    keys = c("Kcnd3", "Pdgfrb"), 
                    keytype = "SYMBOL", 
                    columns = c("SYMBOL", "ENTREZID", "ENSEMBL"))

genes_info
```

```{r}
ig <- graph_from_data_frame(d = kegg_pathways, directed = T)

x <- shortest_paths(graph = ig, 
                    from = V(ig)$name == "18596", 
                    to = V(ig)$name == "56543", 
                    mode = "all")

x
```



```{r}
g <- tbl_graph(nodes = kegg_pathways[, 1:2], edges = kegg_pathways, directed = T)
```

kegg_pathways %>%
